categories: Category:Cut content from Light and Shadow

nodes.text: Yeres Threem was a Vultan Jedi and student of Ven-Mah Tyrrahl. Threem was trained by Tyrrahl on Monfreen, along with fellow Jedi Cayli and Lian Dray. Threem was the first to discover Dray's fall to the dark side, and attacked him, but was killed by Dray. Dray later came to deeply regret Threem's death.
